title: Login Timeout
description: Users in EU region are reporting that the login screen spins for 60 seconds before failing with a timeout. Started after the latest CDN change.

title: Export Button Icon
description: Export button uses download icon instead of export icon. Minor visual inconsistency, functionality correct.

title: Database Connection Pool Exhausted
description: Production database connection pool exhausted during peak hours. API requests failing with 503 errors. Affecting ~30% of users between 2-4pm EST.

title: Dark Mode Logo Contrast
description: Company logo in dark mode has low contrast against dark background. Still visible but doesn't meet brand guidelines. Purely aesthetic.

title: Notifications Disabled
description: All webhook notifications to Zapier stopped around 3am UTC. No payloads recorded since then.

title: Tooltip Text Wording
description: The tooltip on the export button says 'Download data' but should say 'Export data' for consistency. Very minor text change.

title: User Data Deletion Bug
description: Deleting a user account sometimes fails to delete associated records in audit_log table. Manual cleanup required. Affected 3 out of 100 deletions this week.

title: Mobile Menu Animation
description: The mobile menu slide-in animation could be smoother. Current animation works but feels a bit abrupt. Nice-to-have improvement.

title: Payment Gateway Outage
description: Stripe payment gateway unavailable for 15 minutes. All checkout attempts failed during outage. Revenue loss estimated $5K. Service restored automatically.

title: Profile Picture Border
description: User profile pictures in the sidebar don't have the rounded border shown in the mockups. Square corners work, just cosmetic preference.

title: Account Access Locked
description: VIP client locked out after traveling; IP change triggered fraud rules. Need manual unlock plus allowlisting.

title: Search Autocomplete Sorting
description: Search autocomplete results are alphabetically sorted, but users suggested sorting by relevance/frequency. Current sorting works fine, this is an enhancement.

title: Forgot Password Link Expired
description: Password reset links expire after 1 hour but email delivery takes 2-3 hours during peak times. Users can't reset passwords, but can still log in with existing password.

title: Button Hover Color
description: The 'Save' button hover state color is slightly different from the design spec. It's light blue instead of dark blue, but functionality works fine.

title: Corrupted Data Export
description: Monthly KPI export downloaded from /reports returns an unreadable XLSX (Excel says file format mismatch).

title: Keyboard Shortcut Cheat Sheet
description: Feature request: Add a help dialog showing all available keyboard shortcuts. Not critical since shortcuts are documented in settings, but would be convenient.

title: API Response Time Degradation
description: API response times increased from 200ms to 800ms average over last week. Still functional but noticeably slower. Affecting all endpoints.

title: Profile Bio Character Limit
description: The profile bio field allows 500 characters but some users want 1000. Current limit works for most use cases, just a feature request.

title: Unexpected Charge
description: Customer on the starter plan was billed twice for the same invoice (INV-99812). Needs refund and confirmation the duplicate charge won't reoccur.

title: Notification Badge Style
description: The notification badge uses a solid red circle. Request to add option for outline style or different shapes. Pure cosmetic enhancement.

title: Mobile App Crash on iOS 17
description: App crashes on launch for iOS 17.0-17.1 users. Affects ~5% of iOS users. iOS 16 and 17.2+ work fine. Temporary workaround: update iOS or use web version.

title: Email Notification Preference
description: Feature request: Allow users to customize email notification frequency (instant, daily digest, weekly summary). Currently all notifications are instant.

title: SAML Metadata Expired
description: Enterprise client's SAML metadata expired yesterday, causing SSO failures. Need to refresh and notify customer.

title: Export Format Options
description: CSV export only, but users want JSON and Excel options. CSV works fine, this is a feature enhancement request.

title: Session Timeout Too Short
description: User sessions expire after 15 minutes of inactivity. Users frequently have to re-login while filling forms. Works but creates friction, should be 30 minutes.

title: Billing Address Validation
description: Checkout rejects valid Canadian postal codes (format A1A 1A1). Validation regex appears US-only.

title: Search Results Highlighting
description: Search results don't highlight matching terms in the results list. Results are correct but harder to scan. Cosmetic improvement.

title: Upload Crash
description: Desktop app (v2.3.1) crashes whenever a PDF larger than 25MB is uploaded. Stack trace references ImageMagick.

title: Theme Color Option
description: Request to add more theme color options beyond the current 3. Users want purple and green theme variants for personalization.

title: Two-Factor SMS Delay
description: SMS codes arrive after 5+ minutes for carriers in Canada; Twilio logs show delivery status `delayed`.
